mox_kmd_ee module¶

Mox KMD EE main program.

mox_kmd_ee.delete_customer_record(customer_number)[source]¶

Purge relation and customer roles, agreements and products.

mox_kmd_ee.delete_installation_record(product_id)[source]¶

Delete product from LoRa when no longer relevant.

mox_kmd_ee.import_customer(id_and_fields)[source]¶

Import a new customer, log if it fails.

mox_kmd_ee.import_customer_record(fields)[source]¶

Import a new customer record including relation, agreement, products.

Assume customers themselves have already been imported.

mox_kmd_ee.import_installation_record(fields)[source]¶

Import product from KMD EE installation record.

mox_kmd_ee.main()[source]¶

Main program. Calculate changes since last run and sync with LoRa.

  • Argument parsing.
  • Read all customer records from KMD EE and calculate changes.
  • From these changes, delete expired records; import new ones; update existing ones.
  • Repeat for installations/products.

Note that products are not created separately during the inital import, since they’re imported as part of creating each agreement.

mox_kmd_ee.say(*args)[source]¶

Local utility to give output in verbose mode.

mox_kmd_ee.update_customer_record(fields, changed_fields)[source]¶

Update relevant LoRa objects with the specific changes.

mox_kmd_ee.update_installation_record(old_fields, changed_fields)[source]¶

Update relevant LoRa objects with the changes for each installation.
